parameters.functionCode: return items.map(i => ({ json: { risk_type: "weather", severity: i.json.title.includes("Warning") ? 0.8 : 0.5, location: { lat: null, lon: null, radius_km: 200 }, start_time: i.json.pubDate, end_time: null, text: `${i.json.title} - ${i.json.contentSnippet}`, source: "NOAA", external_id: i.json.link } }));
